titleStmt.title: [Li]ntoun address revived, to His Highness the then Prince of Orange now monarch of Great Britain, &c.
titleStmt.author: Pennecuik, Alexander, 1652-1722.

notesStmt.note: Anonymous: attributed to Alexander Pennecuik by Wing.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: left side and bottom of sheet cropped, torn with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
